tile.text: There is only one message on the board, its faded letters leaving you to believe it has been posted for some time now: Action! Adventure! Fair wages! Local merchant seeks tough, independent, and self-motivated warrior to guard their wares on a journey south across the Objective Sea. Not for the faint of heart. Inquire at the blue house just past the market for details.
